title: Olivier Bruyère named winner of IOF Olof Johnell Science Award
description: The 2017 IOF Olof Johnell Science Award was presented to Professor Olivier Bruyère today at the World Congress on Osteoporosis, Osteoarthritis and Musculoskeletal Diseases. The Award recognizes extraordinary  contributions to the field of osteoporosis in a scientific or policy implementation area. It is named in honor of the late Professor Olof Johnell, a Swedish orthopaedic surgeon who made major contributions to the field of osteoporosis and to the work of IOF.
